name: Neon Fall
description:
Draw the lines to protect falling ball!

☄️☄️☄️ The most challenging arcade neon game of 2019 ☄️☄️☄️

Discover Neon Fall, the new game from award-winning developer Mr Lizard.
Make a neon ballz fall down by drawing lines beneath them. Avoid glowing obstacles, don't get caught and fall as low as you can! Dive into a neon world and enjoy calm, simple but addictive gameplay.
Exciting arcade adventure with neon ballz is WAITING FOR YOU.

FEATURES

★ Free to play, play it anywhere anytime 🏆🏆🏆
★ Unique easy-to-learn controls
★ Rich visual effects
★ Simple but addictive gameplay
★ Player-designed modules 🛠️🛠️🛠️
★ Stunning powerups
★ Innovative progressive music system 🎵🎶🎵
★ Neon artstyle
★ Helix music visualization
★ CONSTANTLY EVOLVING
★ Calm, almost zen experience! 🙏🙏🙏
